# Description




<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                     | Type                                | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `initials` | `initials` | Sets avatar initials. The value is trimmed to two characters in total.                          | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | Sets an avatar size.                                                                            | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'m'`       |
| `src`      | `src`      | Sets the source for async image loading. With every change, the image is asynchronously loaded. | `string`                            | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                                 | Type               |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `loading-error` | An event is emitted if async loading fails. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
